== Eravattur (CT) (627387) ==

Eravattur (CT) is a town in the [[Quilandy]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 15.13 sq. km. and harbouring 4126 households with total population of 17016 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 50 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 465 km. Male population is 8223 and female population is 8793. Scheduled Caste population is 2396 and Scheduled Tribes population is 51. Census Location Code of the town is 627387<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 50 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 50 km. Railway station is at Quilandy at a distance of 25 km.
